summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new book/lesson functionality in TradeLingo. All requested features are working correctly including combined category screen, full-screen book reader, page navigation, and level unlocking system.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Console shows 'Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 400' during navigation
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Does not affect functionality - all features work correctly despite console errors

passed_tests: Combined category screen shows book at top and levels below
Book reader opens in full-screen when clicking book
Book page navigation with Next/Previous buttons works correctly
Page dots navigation allows jumping to specific pages
Skip book functionality returns to category screen
Book completion flow (reading all 10 pages) works properly
Final page button correctly shows 'Começar Exercícios' and returns to category
Level 1 selection opens lesson intro screen
Lesson intro screen transitions to exercise screen correctly
Exercise screen loads with proper candlestick chart questions
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Book content displays rich formatting (headers, lists, tips, images)
Level unlock status displays correctly (locked/unlocked states)
Progress tracking shows completed book with green checkmark
Backend API endpoints for category lessons, levels, and exercises all working (100% pass rate)
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate and fix the intermittent 400 console errors during navigation. While functionality works correctly, these errors should be resolved for a clean user experience.

success_percentage.backend: 100% (11/11 tests passed including new book/lesson endpoints)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core functionality working, minor console errors present)
